body_html: My question was not so much about the concrete script you're running, but about how you are launching it, or rather how many instances do you launch at the same time. It's a known fact that if you'll have multiple data-parallel scripts running at the same time, then you can get deadlocks because of the NVIDIA's NCCL library that we're using for communication between GPUs.
